src:
Perkiraan Susunan Pemain Crystal Palace vs Leicester City
03 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dua tim Premier League yang sering membuat kejutan musim ini bakal berhadapan satu sama lain di Selhurst Park, Minggu (3/11/2019) malam WIB: Crystal Palace vs Leicester City. Duel ini tak kalah menarik dari pertandingan tim-tim papan atas.
Palace hanya merasakan satu kekalahan dari lima laga Premier League terakhir sebelum pertandingan ini, sementara Leicester memenangkan empat dari lima pertandingan terakhir mereka, termasuk rekor kemenangan 9-0 atas Southampton akhir pekan lalu.
Bos Leicester, Brendan Rodgers menegaskan bahwa timnya sudah melupakan euforia kemenangan besar tersebut. Dia pun yakin Palace bakal jadi lawan yang lebih sulit.
Biar begitu, dia tidak bisa membantah bahwa Leicester memang salah satu tim kuat di Premier League musim ini. Hanya Manchester United dan Liverpool yang bisa mengalahkan Leicester pada 13 pertandingan terakhir mereka di semua kompetisi.
Rekor apik Leicester itu bakal membuat Roy Hodgson dan Palace waspada. Palace punya potensi luar biasa, tapi masih belum mencapai level yang mereka tampilkan musim lalu.

Peforma Crstal Palace di Premier League: LDWWLD
Performa Leicester di Premier League: LWWLWW
text:
Estimated lineup of Crystal Palace v Leicester City
Nov 3, 2019, 1:00 PM by Bola.net
Soccer - Two Premier League teams that often make surprises this season will face each other at Selhurst Park on Sunday (11/03/2019) night WIB: Crystal Palace vs Leicester City. This duel is no less interesting than the matches of top teams.
Palace only felt one defeat in the last five Premier League matches before this match, while Leicester won four of their last five matches, including a record 9-0 win over Southampton last weekend.
Leicester boss Brendan Rodgers stressed that his team had forgotten the euphoria of the big victory. He also believes Palace will be a more difficult opponent.
Even so, he can't deny that Leicester is indeed one of the strongest teams in the Premier League this season. Only Manchester United and Liverpool have beaten Leicester in their last 13 matches in all competitions.
Leicester's slick record will make Roy Hodgson and Palace wary. Palace has extraordinary potential, but it still hasn't reached the level they showed last season.

Performance of Crstal Palace in the Premier League: LDWWLD
Leicester Performance in the Premier League: LWWLWW
